name: Jump 'n' Gum
description:
Restarts are a bit weird, you can restart with CTRL + R normally.

Controls
<- Movement ->
[ x ] -- Jump

Jump 'n' Gum is a short prototype for a movement based high-score extravaganza.

Lil' gum needs to jump to keep jumping. And if he does not keep on jumping lil gum will be no more. So help lil' gum jump into jump gums so he can jump one more time.

There is currently no difficulty curve to the game so it is a tad bit stale.
